WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V BGP PROSPECTOR TOWING TEN
   8000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   42-01.50S 056-33.70W, 41-46.50S 057-07.20W,
   42-26.20S 057-40.10W, 42-28.70S 057-35.20W,
   42-42.40S 057-46.00W, 42-55.50S 057-17.40W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2311/23.
